name: Speedrunner 101
description:
Ever felt like speedrunning a game but the game isn't optimized for it? Let me introduce to you Speedrunner 101, a platformer game about making your way out as fast as possible.

The maze is full of traps and confusing pathways, so be careful of choosing your destination!

----------------
Controls
Left Key, Right Key - Move left or right
Space - Jump
R - Reset (in case you get stuck. Timer does not reset)
